price: 164. (Waxaana soo dirnay) Rusul aan kaaga warrannay horey, iyo Rusul aanaan kaaga warramin, Allena wuxuu ula hadlay Muuse si toos ah hadlid56.
arabic: وَرُسُلٗا قَدۡ قَصَصۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَيۡكَ مِن قَبۡلُ وَرُسُلٗا لَّمۡ نَقۡصُصۡهُمۡ عَلَيۡكَۚ وَكَلَّمَ ٱللَّهُ مُوسَىٰ تَكۡلِيمٗا
footnotes: 56. Wuxuu Alle la hadlay Muuse toos dhexeeya la’aan, waxayna ka mid yihiin tilmaamahiisa, sidaa awgeed baa loo yidhaahdaa kaliimul Laah, halka Rususha kale waxyiga la soo marsiiyey Jabriil, wuxuuna Alle la hadlay Nabi Muxammad s.c.w. toos habeenkii Micraajka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: warusulan qad qaṣaṣnāhum ʿalayka min qablu warusulan lam naqṣuṣ'hum ʿalayka wakallama al-lahu mūsā taklīman
